sentences.english: It is impossible that markets are in the same market.
sentences.chinese: 交易所記帳式債券也能在股市裏買。

sentences.english: Many stock markets around the world exist a pre-opening period before trading actually occurs.
sentences.chinese: 股市開市前議價期存在於世界一些主要證券交易所。

sentences.english: The first time I had seen her was in the Place de la Bourse, outside Susse's.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次是在交易所廣場絮斯商店門口遇到她的。

sentences.english: The IC3 is the clearinghouse for online crime complaints in the U. S.
sentences.chinese: IC3是美國爲網絡犯罪投訴設置的交易所。

sentences.english: The earliest stock exchanges emerge in Bruges and Italy in the thirteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 十三世紀，最早的股票交易所出現於布魯日與意大利。

sentences.english: Article 99. A board of directors is set up in a stock exchange.
sentences.chinese: 第九十九條證券交易所設理事會。

sentences.english: Last year, Refco was the largest provider of customer transaction volume to the CME.
sentences.chinese: 去年，瑞富在芝加哥商品交易所的客戶成交量最大。

sentences.english: Ms. Yu Yali, Vice President of the Bank of Communications, visited SGE.
sentences.chinese: 交通銀行副行長於亞利訪問交易所。

sentences.english: Article 106 A stock exchange shall have a board of governors.
sentences.chinese: 第一百零六條證券交易所設理事會。

sentences.english: Li Jin is deputy director of the research and development department at Shanghai Environment and Energy Exchange.
sentences.chinese: 李瑾，上海能源環境交易所研發部副部長。

sentences.english: You see centaurs running to the trading post, knocking the walls down, burning and killing the merchants.
sentences.chinese: 你會看到半人馬跑向交易所，推倒牆壁，燒殺商人。

sentences.english: So it's been with the venerable Merc jacket.
sentences.chinese: 所以，這與古老芝加哥商業交易所的外套。

sentences.english: Most offices were closed, along with the Bombay Stock Exchange.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的辦公室都關了門，孟買證券交易所也不例外。

sentences.english: Stock prices broke quickly at the New York Exchange.
sentences.chinese: 紐約證券交易所的股票價格狂瀉。

sentences.english: Conceptualisation of KLOFFE as an "Options and Futures Exchange".
sentences.chinese: 吉隆坡期貨和期權交易所的概念化？

sentences.english: There are a multitude of ETFs and mutual funds.
sentences.chinese: 交易所買賣基金和共同基金有很多。

definition: token (used instead of money for slot machines, in game arcades etc)
abbr. for 期貨合約|期货合约[qi1 huo4 he2 yue1], futures contract (finance)
